name: The Man Who Was A Horse
name_original: The Man Who Was A Horse
description:
"The man who was a horse" is a horror comedy about a guy transforming into a horse. This is a kinetic novel made for fun, there has also been made a short movie (School Project) about the story back in 2017. This is a my first visual novel in Ren'Py I tried my best. I highly recommend downloading the game for optimal experience. ^_^

Average read ~20 min.
